hero.description: We are architects of the new digital economy. Connecting visionaries, developers, and innovators to build the infrastructure of tomorrow.

about.title: About Us
about.missionDescription: CUITBCA is dedicated to promoting the understanding and application of blockchain technology on campus, providing students with a platform for learning, exchange, and practice. We believe blockchain technology will shape the future.
about.visionDescription: To build an open, inclusive, and innovative learning community that helps students master blockchain technology and cultivate outstanding talent for the industry.
values: Openness - Welcome all students interested in blockchain
Innovation - Continuously explore new learning approaches

highlights.title: Activity Frequency
highlights.value: Weekly online sharing and practice activities

highlights.title: Development Direction
highlights.value: Promote the application and popularization of blockchain technology on campus

members.title: Team Members
members.ctaDescription: We welcome all students interested in blockchain technology to join the CUITBCA family! Together, let's explore the decentralized future.
